entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as following Hermione along a row of quills in copper pots. He is described as being 'positively quivering with indignation' when discussing Ginny's feelings for Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as examining a long black-and-gold quill and handing over money at the counter. She is described as looking at Ron 'rather pityingly' when discussing Ginny's feelings for Harry.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as having previously fancied Harry, but giving up on him months ago. She is described as 'talking now' in front of Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being the subject of discussion between Ron and Hermione about Ginny's feelings for him. He is described as having 'Cho's parting wave' still in his head.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as someone Harry has a connection with, described as 'parting wave'.

relationships.description: Ron follows Hermione along a row of quills in copper pots.
Ginny used to fancy Harry, but gave up on him months ago.
Hermione is talking to Ginny in front of Harry.
